price: Enti obi a obetwa nkontompo ato Nyankopͻn so wͻ woi akyi no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne nnipa bͻnefoͻ no.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
